ORIGAM Documentation : Vertical Axis

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Mar 04, 2019

The Vertical Axis element describes the properties of the Y axis of a Column or a Line Chart. The field with the mapped values is set in the attributes of the Column and the Line Series. 

ATTRIBUTES

NameName of the element.
CaptionName describing the values on the Y axis.
ApplyMaxLimitSelect True, if you want to apply a maximum limit. Default is False.
ApplyMinLimitSelect True, if you want to apply a minimum limit. Default is False.
MaxEnter the maximum limit.
MinEnter the minimum limit.
